Title: Reflected cross-site scripting in default RouteNotFoundError view in Vaadin 10 and 11-13
Description:
Missing output sanitization in default `RouteNotFoundError` view in `com.vaadin:flow-server` versions 1.0.0 through 1.0.10 (Vaadin 10.0.0 through 10.0.13), and 1.1.0 through 1.4.2 (Vaadin 11.0.0 through 13.0.5) allows attacker to execute malicious JavaScript via crafted URL.

- https://vaadin.com/security/cve-2019-25027
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 10.0.0 before 10.0.14, all versions starting from 11.0.0 before 13.0.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 10.0.0, all versions starting from 10.0.14 before 11.0.0, all versions starting from 13.0.6
